entry.title: How Might the War in Ukraine End? Five Factors Will Shape the Outcome
entry.content: Russian forces have performed poorly thus far, but Ukraine’s military is expected to eventually crack. What then?

entry.title: Ukraine's Kharkiv Front Line Holds Despite Bombardment
entry.content: Russian forces pounded Ukraine’s second-largest city with airstrikes in a bid to break the will of the country’s resistance as Moscow’s offensive toward Kyiv stalled and Ukrainian officials said the invasion’s civilian death toll has reached 2,000.

entry.title: Black, Asian and Middle Eastern Refugees Fleeing Ukraine Are Blocked at Border
entry.content: People from Africa, South Asia and the Middle East say they were pulled aside, as guards prioritized Ukrainians.
